title: TopDocs and TopFieldDocs does not implement equals and hashCode

comments.content: The summary refers to TopDocs and TopFieldDocs, but the diff changes FieldDoc and ScoreDoc ... was it ment to cover all four?
comments.author: Hoss Man

comments.content:
> The summary refers to TopDocs and TopFieldDocs, but the diff changes FieldDoc and ScoreDoc ... was it ment to cover all four? 

Oups, that was a typeo. I'm a confused young man.

It does however make sense to cover all four while I'm at it. I'll patch some more.
comments.author: Karl Wettin

comments.content: Still want to push forward with this issue?
comments.author: Mark Miller
